catalog_info.title: Latin Prose Selections (Classical)
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Latin Ab, Aab, Ac, or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: A bridge between the study of Latin grammar and the reading of prose authors; intended to develop reading and translation skills and introduce prose styles. The readings are short selections from a variety of genres by authors such as Cicero, Pliny, Nepos, Sallust, and Petronius.
